ComicInfo.Summary:
Strange Secret of the Huan Shan Idol: Craig assists Choong Sun and his daughter in looking for a mystical Buddha statue.
The Murder Machine: A writer falls in love with one of the characters in his novel.
An Old Chinese Custom: A coffin ends up being used as a life boat.
Shadow of the Devil-Doll: A new hotel owner angers a voodoo priest.
ComicInfo.Title: Strange Secret of the Huan Shan Idol; The Murder Machine; An Old Chinese Custom; Shadow of the Devil-Doll
